1.name: En busca de la espada de las estrellas
1.title: En busca de la espada de las estrellas
1.title_es: En busca de la espada de las estrellas

plot: Astronaut John Blackstar's shuttle passes through a black hole and crashes on the planet Sagar. He is rescued by the gentle Trobbits, who live under the tyranny of the Overlord, possessor of one half of an all-powerful sword. Armed with the other half, Blackstar aids the resistance with his dragon, Warlock; the shape-shifter Klone; and the sorceress, Mara.   Written by  Derek C.
title: Blackstar
